title: Celebrate 33 years of protecting the EU’s nature and join a Bioblitz near you
summary: European Natura 2000 Day is celebrated every year on 21 May. It marks the inception, 33 years ago, of a revolutionary approach to nature conservation in the EU – a large network of protected nature that maintains opportunities for economic and recreational development.

title: Commission adopts a user-friendly planning tool to support Member States in implementing the Nature Restoration Regulation
summary: The European Commission has adopted an Implementing Regulation that establishes a uniform format for national restoration plans under the Nature Restoration Regulation, which entered into force in August 2024.

title: Montenegro Joins the EU's LIFE Programme for Environment and Climate Action
summary: A cornerstone of the European Union's commitment to environmental protection and climate action, the LIFE programme offers Montenegro support to improve its environmental and climate policies and practices.

title: EU welcomes outcomes of Basel, Rotterdam and Stockholm Conventions COPs
summary: The recent outcomes of Basel, Rotterdam and Stockholm Conventions COPs mark a significant milestone in global efforts to address environmental challenges.

title: The EU Ecolabel keeps greening the absorbent hygiene products’ market
summary: Trust and transparency were the main keywords arising from the webinar “Caring for you, caring for the environment,” which spotlighted the benefits of the EU Ecolabel - the official EU ecolabel for product environmental excellence - in the absorbent hygiene sector.

title: Webinar: Caring for you, caring for the environment: the EU Ecolabel for absorbent hygiene products
summary: Discover how the EU Ecolabel for absorbent hygiene products boosts competitiveness, ensures environmental excellence, and aligns with EU legislation. Join the European Commission’s webinar on 9 April 2025 to explore business benefits and hear from industry leaders. Register now!

title: The EU Ecolabel for cosmetic products webinar
summary: Trustworthy, informative, enlightening and insightful: these were some of the key takeaways from the webinar "When Beauty Meets Green", which aimed to explain the opportunities offered by the EU Ecolabel for cosmetic products.

title: EU Ecolabel Cosmetics Webinar
summary: Join the webinar ‘ When beauty meets green: the EU Ecolabel for cosmetic products ’ on 11 December 2024 to learn all you need to know about the EU Ecolabel, its future perspectives, and the opportunities it offers cosmetics producers to showcase the environmental credentials of their products.

title: EU invests over €380 million in 133 new LIFE projects to support the green transition all around Europe
summary: The Commission has granted today more than €380 million to 133 new projects across Europe under the LIFE Programme for environment and climate action.

title: Nature Restoration Law enters into force
summary: The regulation sets binding targets to restore degraded ecosystems, particularly those with the most potential to capture and store carbon.

title: New legislation gives EU Ecolabel big thumbs up
summary: The EU Ecolabel is preparing for a major boost thanks to the new and upcoming legislation.  Discover how our labelling scheme supports the EU's green transition.

title: Monitoring report on progress towards the SDGs in an EU context — 2024
summary: Eurostat has published the ‘Sustainable development in the European Union — 2024 monitoring report on progress towards the SDGs in an EU context'.

title: Bringing sustainable tourism into the spotlight: the EU Ecolabel for tourist accommodation
summary: Trustworthy, inspiring, sustainable, creating change: these are the words the audience associated with the EU Ecolabel in the latest webinar, ‘Bring tourist accommodation into the green spotlight with the EU Ecolabel’.

title: Europeans continue to feel directly affected by environmental issues and policy
summary: A new Eurobarometer survey found that more than three-quarters of citizens believe the environment has a direct impact on their daily life.

title: Europe’s bathing waters remain safe
summary: The majority of bathing water sites in 2023 met the EU's most stringent quality standards, according to the latest annual report.

title: EU Ecolabel Webinar: Opportunities for businesses in tourist accommodation
summary: Join the webinar ‘Bring tourist accommodation into the green spotlight with the EU Ecolabel’ on 11 June 2024 to learn all you need to know about the EU Ecolabel, how it works, its future perspectives and discover the opportunities it offers to tourist accommodations.

title: EU continues its engagement in global water cooperation
summary: From 18-25 May, EU representatives will be attending the 10th edition of the World Water Forum in Bali, Indonesia.

title: How the EU Ecolabel helps reduce water waste and pollution
summary: It’s time to be water wise! The EU's new #WaterWiseEU campaign aims to raise awareness about water related issues, showcase solutions and inspire change. Learn how EU Ecolabel products are part of the solution!

title: EU Ecolabel - March 2024 Facts and Figures

title: Revision of EU Ecolabel criteria for textile  products
summary: The criteria for the Textile product group is under revision. The first multistakeholder working group to revise the criteria is scheduled between the 18th and 19th of March.

title: Revision of EU Ecolabel criteria for cleaning products
summary: The criteria for the Detergents product group is under revision. The first multistakeholder working group to revise the criteria is scheduled between the 12 th and 13 th of March.

title: Drinking water to become safer thanks to new EU-wide hygiene standards

title: Commission welcomes provisional agreement for more sustainable, repairable and circular products

title: Commission welcomes political agreement on protecting the environment through criminal law
